scripts.i18n:make-pot: wp-env run cli -- bash -c 'php -d memory_limit=512M /usr/local/bin/wp i18n make-pot wp-content/themes/wp-soli-clean-theme wp-content/themes/wp-soli-clean-theme/languages/soli-clean-theme.pot --domain=soli-clean-theme --exclude=node_modules,test-results,playwright-report'
scripts.i18n:make-mo: wp-env run cli -- bash -c 'php -d memory_limit=512M /usr/local/bin/wp i18n make-mo wp-content/themes/wp-soli-clean-theme/languages'
scripts.i18n:build: npm run i18n:make-pot && npm run i18n:make-mo
